name: Acoustic Guitar Pro
description:
Acoustic Guitar Pro is Professional music instrument in which you can play this Guitar and feel like playing Real Guitar.

Features
-Guitar with Professional sound.
-Play, Record,Save & Share your creativity.
-You have access to all the octaves.
-Drum Loop Pack available to use in the Game.
-Very easy to use this Guitar.
-This App is fully tested on iPhone 5,5s,6,6s & iPad (All).
